programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Bob Hope, Joan Rivers, Michael Landon (9/24/74)
programme.desc: The audience corrects Johnny on when autumn began. Bob Hope has an anniversary special.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Jim Fowler, Tom Hanks (4/8/82)
programme.desc: Carnac the Magnificent stops by. Wild Kingdom's Jim Fowler brings animals. Tom Hanks preps for fatherhood.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Joan Embery, Buddy Hackett, Steve Martin (11/22/73)
programme.desc: Joan Embery brings out baby orangutans for Johnny and Ed, Buddy Hackett talks golf and tennis.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Joan Embery, Albert Brooks (7/25/79)
programme.desc: Joan Embery of the San Diego Zoo brings a baby gorilla. Albert Brooks is looking forward to the 1980s.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Charles Grodin, The Amazing Randi (3/22/73)
programme.desc: The Amazing Randi does a stunt involving a ladder. Charles Grodin details a recent harrowing plane flight.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Lucille Ball, Jay Leno, Erma Bombeck (4/28/77)
programme.desc: Lucille Ball and Johnny talk about their legacies. Jay Leno does standup.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Rich Little, McLean Stevenson, Jean Marsh (5/12/78)
programme.desc: Johnny does his version of Mr. Rogers. Rich Little impersonates Johnny, McLean Stevenson is doing a new movie.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Joan Rivers, Harvey Korman (9/17/75)
programme.desc: Johnny re-enacts the Hamilton and Burr duel. Joan Rivers admits to screaming during childbirth.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Steve Lawrence, Rodney Dangerfield, Susan Sarandon, Christopher Reeve (1/31/79)
programme.desc: Rodney Dangerfield cracks up both Johnny and the audience, Christopher Reeve is hot off Superman.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Martin Mull, Betty White, Barry Bremen (2/9/79)
programme.desc: Johnny talks about a trip to the butcher. Martin Mull sings and plays guitar.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Lauren Bacall, David Steinberg, Eubie Blake (1/11/80)
programme.desc: Johnny jokes about the rain in his monologue before being joined by Lauren Bacall.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Dean Martin, Florence Henderson (2/22/80)
programme.desc: Johnny mentions the U.S. hockey team winning Olympic gold and is joined by Rat Pack member Dean Martin.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Sammy Davis Jr., Shelley Winters, Michelle Pfeiffer, Burt Reynolds (8/1/80)
programme.desc: Sammy Davis, Jr. is a fan of soap operas and Burt Reynolds surprises him. Shelley Winters talks about her book.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - David Letterman, Susan Sarandon (1/2/81)
programme.desc: David Letterman brings Johnny some party supplies to help ring in the new year.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Candice Bergen, Doug Henning (10/9/81)
programme.desc: Candice Bergen talks about developing a Southern accent for a role; Doug Henning does an illusion.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Angie Dickinson, Garry Shandling, Pilobolus (10/29/81)
programme.desc: Johnny does some card tricks for Angie Dickinson. Garry Shandling performs standup.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Jim Fowler, Tom Hanks (4/8/82)
programme.desc: Carnac the Magnificent stops by. Wild Kingdom's Jim Fowler brings animals. Tom Hanks preps for fatherhood.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Jimmy Stewart, Garry Shandling (12/7/82)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart wasn't the greatest Boy Scout then reads a poem, Garry Shandling does standup about air travel.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Buddy Hackett, William Shatner (2/3/83)
programme.desc: Buddy Hackett got served a suckling pig at a New York restaurant and William Shatner talks presenting an award.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Steve Lawrence, Rodney Dangerfield, Susan Sarandon, Christopher Reeve (1/31/79)
programme.desc: Rodney Dangerfield cracks up both Johnny and the audience, Christopher Reeve is hot off Superman.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Martin Mull, Betty White, Barry Bremen (2/9/79)
programme.desc: Johnny talks about a trip to the butcher. Martin Mull sings and plays guitar.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Lauren Bacall, David Steinberg, Eubie Blake (1/11/80)
programme.desc: Johnny jokes about the rain in his monologue before being joined by Lauren Bacall.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of Johnny and Guests - Dean Martin, Florence Henderson (2/22/80)
programme.desc: Johnny mentions the U.S. hockey team winning Olympic gold and is joined by Rat Pack member Dean Martin.
